Verses: 1 karththaave, Yaar Ummudaiya Koodaaraththil Thanguvaan? Yaar Ummudaiya Parisuththa Parvadhaththil Vaasampannuvaan?
2 uththamanaai Nadandhu, Needhiyai Nadappiththu, Manadhaara Saththiyaththaip Pesugiravandhaane.
3 avan Than Naavinaal Purankooraamalum, Than Thozhanukkuth Theenguseyyaamalum, Than Ayalaanmel Sollappadum Nindhaiyaana Pechchai Edukkaamalum Irukkiraan.
4 aagaadhavan Avan Paarvaikkuth Theezhppaanavan; Karththarukkup Bayandhavargalaiyo Kanampannugiraan; Aanaiyittadhil Thanakku Nashtam Vandhaalum Thavaraadhirukkiraan.
5 than Panaththai Vattikkukkodaamalum, Kutramillaadhavanukku Virodhamaaip Paridhaanam Vaangaamalum Irukkiraan. Ippadi Seygiravan Endrendraikkum Asaikkappaduvadhillai.
